Class AnimationComponent

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.components.AnimationComponent
public class AnimationComponent extends Object
Handles animated effects for game components, such as explosions and level-up animations.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private static final double
    EXPLOSION_FRAME_DURATION

  • Constructor Details

    • AnimationComponent

      public AnimationComponent(javafx.scene.Group parentGroup)
      Constructs an AnimationComponent instance.
      Parameters:
      parentGroup - the parent Group where animations will be displayed

  • Method Details

    • loadFrames

      protected static List<javafx.scene.image.Image> loadFrames(String prefix, int totalFrames)
      Loads animation frames from the specified directory.
      Parameters:
      prefix - the prefix of the image file names
      totalFrames - the total number of frames to load
      Returns:
      a list of Image objects representing the animation frames

    • playExplosion

      public void playExplosion(double x, double y, double scale, Runnable onFinished)
      Plays an explosion animation at the specified location.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the explosion
      y - the y-coordinate of the explosion
      scale - the scale of the explosion
      onFinished - a callback to be executed when the animation finishes, or null

    • playExplosion

      public void playExplosion(double x, double y, double scale)
      Plays an explosion animation at the specified location with no callback.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the explosion
      y - the y-coordinate of the explosion
      scale - the scale of the explosion

    • playLevelUpRelative

      public void playLevelUpRelative(javafx.scene.Node parent, double offsetX, double offsetY, double scale)
      Plays a level-up animation relative to a parent node.
      Parameters:
      parent - the parent node where the animation will be anchored
      offsetX - the x-offset relative to the parent node
      offsetY - the y-offset relative to the parent node
      scale - the scale of the animation

    • playAnimation

      private void playAnimation(double x, double y, double scale, Runnable onFinished)
      Plays a generic animation using the specified frames and settings.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate where the animation will be displayed
      y - the y-coordinate where the animation will be displayed
      scale - the scale of the animation
      onFinished - a callback to be executed when the animation finishes, or null

    • createImageView

      private javafx.scene.image.ImageView createImageView(double scale, double offsetX, double offsetY)
      Creates an ImageView for displaying animation frames.
      Parameters:
      scale - the scale of the image
      offsetX - the x-offset of the image
      offsetY - the y-offset of the image
      Returns:
      the initialized ImageView

    • setImageViewSize

      private void setImageViewSize(javafx.scene.image.ImageView imageView, double scale)
      Sets the size and position of an ImageView.
      Parameters:
      imageView - the ImageView to modify
      scale - the scale factor

    • createTimeline

      private javafx.animation.Timeline createTimeline(List<javafx.scene.image.Image> frames, javafx.scene.image.ImageView imageView, double frameDuration, Runnable onFinished)
      Creates a Timeline for animating a sequence of frames.
      Parameters:
      frames - the list of Image frames
      imageView - the ImageView to update
      frameDuration - the duration of each frame in milliseconds
      onFinished - a callback to be executed when the animation finishes
      Returns:
      the constructed Timeline
